text: On the Bus with Rosa Parks is a book of poems by Rita Dove.http://www.litencyc.com/php/sworks.php?rec=true&UID;=12733 Rosa Parks was an American activist in the civil rights movement best known for her pivotal role in the Montgomery bus boycott. The United States Congress has called her "the first lady of civil rights" and "the mother of the freedom movement".. Retrieved November 13, 2011.
